answers.answer: Although the underlying cause of the gastroparesis needs to be determined, I can say prettty confidently that yes, acupuncture can help with nausea due to many ailments.  The acupuncture point Stomach 36 has been studied extensively, and one of the many findings was that needling the point could increase stomach emptying time.  If the condition is due to say, diabetes, acupuncture and Chinese medicine can be very helpful in dealing with the diabetes, getting to the root cause instead of just treating symptoms.  You can find an acupuncturist in your area by going to:www.nccaom.org

question: Can acupuncture help nausea caused by gastroparesis?    What other conditions will it help?
title: treatment for nausea
